name: The Therapist´s Therapist
description:
‘A former renown therapist ends up as a patient in a closed off psychiatry and needs to figure out the truth of their sudden hospitalization.’

The Therapist’s Therapist is a mixture of a text-based adventure game with a two-dimensional point-and-click gameplay settled in the genre thriller and adventure-mystery. The story is about a renowned therapist suddenly getting hospitalized in the psychiatry they were formerly working in. They are now surrounded by their former patients and co- workers, some of them friendly and some of the hostile holding a grudge against them. Now it is their time to figure out the secrets of Crampbell psychiatry, learn the truth about their hospitalization and regain freedom from their unjust situation by inspecting, talking and interacting with every person and corner in Crampbell Psychiatry.

– by The Traitors
